 when true lastret won't be changed

Detailed Description

Base class for all VQ operations. Authorization module was split to cauth class.

Definition at line 46 of file cvq.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum cvq::auth_info_flags
 

possible user account flags

Enumeration values:
pop3_blk  blocked pop3 access
smtp_blk  blocked smtp access
admin  admin (it was first added user)
ftp_blk  ftp access blocked
ignore  ignore me (entry MUST be ignored)
supadm  super (server) admin

Definition at line 151 of file cvq.h.

enum cvq::udot_type
 

Mailbox options.

Enumeration values:
redir  redirection
maildir  maildir
sms  sms notification
autoresp  autorespond
